content:
CalendarSelectionMode Enum

Definition

Specifies whether a single or multiple dates can be selected in a Calendar.

In this Article

public enum CalendarSelectionMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
CalendarSelectionMode

Fields

MultipleRange

Multiple non-contiguous ranges of dates can be selected. Use the stem.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates* property to retrieve the selected dates.
None

No selections are allowed.
SingleDate

A single date can be selected. Use the stem.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDate* property to retrieve the selected date.
SingleRange

A single range of dates can be selected. Use the stem.Windows.Controls.Calendar.SelectedDates* property to retrieve the selected dates.
